item.title: murza add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: murza add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: murza add a quote by Christopher Paolini
item.description: "Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now." -- Christopher Paolini

item.title: murza add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: murza add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: murza add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description: "People don't care how much you know until they know how much you care" -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description:
"Question for God every morning:
What is the main event today? What do you want me to focus on today?" -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by John Maxwell
item.description: "You have to live with the people to know their needs, and you have to live with God to know how to solve them." -- John Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description: "We feel unhappy and confused with our life when we don't do the focus or calling that God has on our life." -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by John C. Maxwell
item.description: "Relational skills are the most important abilities in leadership." -- John C. Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by John Maxwell
item.description: "Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it." -- John Maxwell

item.title: murza add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: murza add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: murza add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: murza add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom." -- Aristotle

item.title: murza add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: murza add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world." -- C.S. Lewis
